Description:
Notice Serial number:  IN/13/DC/030322/01   312344567
You have not taken suitable and sufficient steps to ensure that your construction site has been organised in such a way that Operatives and mobile construction plant equipment / vehicles can move around the site without risks to health and safety, in that there is no segregation between Operatives and mobile contruction plant equipment / vehicles where it is reasonably practicable to do so in areas where Operatives and mobile construction plant equipment / vehicles are using the same traffic routes.
